definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Curious sightseers rolled up in their hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的好奇的观光客都涌到那儿。

sentences.english: But it has already become a must-see site for tourists when they arrive in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 但多年来早已成为观光客到巴塞隆纳必经之地。

sentences.english: The beach was touristy in summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏季海滩为观光客所喜欢。

sentences.english: Visitors and locals alike meander along the sidewalks of the Seine River.
sentences.chinese: 观光客和本地人都会沿着塞纳河的河滨步道漫步。

sentences.english: For 73 years, Kai Tak airport greeted visitors from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 启德机场73年来迎接来自世界各地的观光客。

sentences.english: Shi Shahai now is not only the public park, and attract many tourists.
sentences.chinese: 现在的什刹海不仅是市民的乐园，也吸引许多观光客。

sentences.english: A holidaymaker died after falling from a hotel balcony.
sentences.chinese: 一位观光客从饭店的阳台坠楼身亡。

sentences.english: They really soak the tourists in that restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 他们在那家餐厅真的把观光客当成冤大头。

sentences.english: I guide tourists to attractions around Kaohsiung.
sentences.chinese: 我为观光客导览高雄的景点。

sentences.english: A mugger demanded the tourist's money.
sentences.chinese: 强盗向那位观光客索取金钱。

sentences.english: In Abu Dhabi, there are bars, and female tourists do not need to wear black robes or scarves.
sentences.chinese: 在阿布达比有酒吧，女观光客也不用穿黑袍与披肩。

sentences.english: They also want to encourage tourists to continue to visit Cusco.
sentences.chinese: 他们亦想要鼓励观光客继续参观库斯科。

sentences.english: Today tourists have many options on how they can get close to wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 现在，观光客有多种可以接近野生生物的选择。

sentences.english: A tourist covered with mud stands on the shore of the Dead Sea in Ein Gedi in this picture taken April 27, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 在隐该地，一位观光客全身覆满泥巴，站在死海湖畔。

sentences.english: This did not keep the tourists from returning, though.
sentences.chinese: 但这并没有阻止观光客再度回到庞贝城。

sentences.english: Taroko Gorge attracts a lot of tourists, especially in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 太鲁阁引很多观光客，尤其在夏天的时候。

definition: (Tw) tourist from mainland China/illegal immigrant from mainland China
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
